content.text:
# Houston Film Critics Society Awards 2016

| location       = Sundance Cinemas Houston, Houston, Texas
| website        =
| previous       = 2015
| main           = HFCSA
| next           = 2017
}}
The 10th Houston Film Critics Society Awards nominations were announced on December 12, 2016. The ceremony was held on January 6, 2017.
Winners and nominees
Winners are listed first and highlighted with boldface.
{| class="wikitable" style="width:100%"
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Best Picture
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Best Foreign Language Film
|-
| valign="top" |
* La La Land
** Arrival
** The Handmaiden
** Hell or High Water
** Jackie
** Lion
** Manchester by the Sea
** Moonlight
** The Nice Guys
** Nocturnal Animals
| valign="top" |
* 'The Handmaiden • South Korea'
** Elle • France
** A Man Called Ove • Sweden
** Neruda • Chile
** Toni Erdmann • Germany
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Best Actor
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Best Actress
|-
| valign="top" |
* 'Casey Affleck - Manchester by the Sea'
** Andrew Garfield - Hacksaw Ridge
** Ryan Gosling - La La Land
** Jake Gyllenhaal - Nocturnal Animals
** Viggo Mortensen - Captain Fantastic
** Denzel Washington - Fences
| valign="top" |
* 'Natalie Portman - Jackie'
** Amy Adams - Arrival
** Rebecca Hall - Christine
** Isabelle Huppert - Elle
** Emma Stone - La La Land
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Best Supporting Actor
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Best Supporting Actress
|-
| valign="top" |
* 'Jeff Bridges - Hell or High Water'
** Ben Foster - Hell or High Water
** Lucas Hedges - Manchester by the Sea
** Dev Patel - Lion
** Michael Shannon - Nocturnal Animals
| valign="top" |
* 'Viola Davis - Fences'
** Greta Gerwig - 20th Century Women
** Naomie Harris - Moonlight
** Octavia Spencer - Hidden Figures
** Michelle Williams - Manchester by the Sea
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Best Director
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Best Cinematography
|-
| valign="top" |
* 'Damien Chazelle - La La Land'
** Barry Jenkins - Moonlight
** Kenneth Lonergan - Manchester by the Sea
** David Mackenzie - Hell or High Water
** Denis Villeneuve - Arrival
| valign="top" |
* 'La La Land - Linus Sandgren'
** Jackie - Stéphane Fontaine
** Moonlight - James Laxton
** Nocturnal Animals - Seamus McGarvey
** Arrival - Bradford Young
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Best Animated Feature Film
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Best Documentary Feature
|-
| valign="top" |
* Kubo and the Two Strings
** Finding Dory
** Moana
** Sausage Party
** Zootopia
| valign="top" |
* O.J.: Made in America
** 13th
** Tower
** Weiner
** Zero Days
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Best Original Score
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Best Original Song
|-
| valign="top" |
* 'La La Land - Justin Hurwitz'
** Moonlight - Nicholas Britell
** Arrival - Jóhann Jóhannsson
** Jackie - Mica Levi
** Nocturnal Animals - Abel Korzeniowski
| valign="top" |
* '"City of Stars" by Justin Hurwitz and Pasek and Paul - La La Land'
** "Audition (The Fools Who Dream)" by Justin Hurwitz and Pasek and Paul - La La Land
** "Drive It Like You Stole It" by Gary Clark - Sing Street
** "How Far I'll Go" by Lin-Manuel Miranda - Moana
** "Runnin'" by Pharrell Williams - Hidden Figures
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Best Screenplay
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Best Poster
|-
| valign="top" |
* 'Hell or High Water - Taylor Sheridan'
** La La Land - Damien Chazelle
** Arrival - Eric Heisserer
** Moonlight - Barry Jenkins and Tarell Alvin McCraney
** Manchester by the Sea - Kenneth Lonergan
| valign="top" |
* La La Land
** Captain Fantastic
** Hunt for the Wilderpeople
** Jackie
** Moonlight
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Texas Independent Film Award
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Technical Achievement
|-
| valign="top" |
* Tower
** Krisha
** Slash
** A Song for You
** Southwest of Salem
| valign="top" |
* 'La La Land (Production Design)'
** Doctor Strange (Visual Effects)
** The Jungle Book (Visual Effects)
|-
! style="background:#EEDD82; width:50%"| Worst Film
|-
| valign="top" |
* Zoolander 2
** Gods of Egypt
** Independence Day: Resurgence
** Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
** Yoga Hosers
|-
|}
